# Electronic Mailing List Solution Tender

## Title
Electronic Mailing List Solution

## Number and Status
Reference Number: SSC-24-00028290
Solicitation Number: BPM022553/28290
Status: Open

## Brief Description
The Canada Revenue Agency (CRA) is seeking a comprehensive electronic mailing list solution to replace its current solution (Aurea List Manager). The proposed solution will provide automated mailing list management capabilities to CRA program areas, enabling them to send email messages both internally and to the public.

## Solution Requirements
- The solution will provide secure, reliable, and user-friendly features.
- The solution will cater to program areas' mailing list management needs.
- Estimated quantity of commodity: to be determined.
- The contract duration is for 2 years with 5 one-year option periods.

## Key Dates
- Tender Closing Date: December 31, 2024, at 14:00:00.
- Expected Contract Startup Date: March 4, 2026.

## Conducting the Procurement
This procurement will follow a competitive process, and the selection criteria will be based on thesupplier's proposals.
